Class RescheduleAppointmentScreen

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.framework.screens.Screen
com.group6.hms.framework.screens.option.OptionScreen
com.group6.hms.framework.screens.pagination.PaginationTableScreen<Appointment>
com.group6.hms.app.screens.patient.RescheduleAppointmentScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScreenLifeCycle
public class RescheduleAppointmentScreen extends PaginationTableScreen<Appointment>
The RescheduleAppointmentScreen class displays a lists of patient's appointments, allowing patient to select the appointment ID that want to reschedule and book. It extends PaginationTableScreen to display the list in paginated view.

This screen allows the patient to choose an existing available appointment slot for rescheduling and select which scheduled appointment the patient want to change.

      public RescheduleAppointmentScreen(List<Appointment> appointmentList, Availability availability, Patient patient)

  • Method Details

    • handleOption

      protected void handleOption(int optionId)
      Handles the selection of an option by the user. If the "Reschedule Appointment" options is selected, it called the rescheduleAppointment() method.
      Overrides:
      handleOption in class PaginationTableScreen<Appointment>
      Parameters:
      optionId - The ID of the option selected by the user.
